blogPost.excerpt: https://pry.co helps founders and makers manage their finances. Instead of using Excel, Founders and business owners can use Pry to manage their budget, expenses, hiring plan, and cash runway.
blogPost.body: https://pry.co helps founders and makers manage their finances. Instead of using Excel, Founders and business owners can use Pry to manage their budget, expenses, hiring plan, and cash runway.
blogPost.title: Pry - Finance for founders and makers
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: https://pry.co 帮助创始人和制造商管理他们的财务。而不是使用Excel，创始人和企业主可以使用Pry来管理他们的预算、支出、招聘计划和现金跑道。
localize.tagline: 创始人和制造者的融资

localize.description: https://pry.co 幫助創始人和製造商管理他們的財務。而不是使用Excel，創始人和企業主可以使用Pry來管理他們的預算、支出、招聘計劃和現金跑道。
localize.tagline: 創始人和製造者的融資

previous.excerpt: Whether you're a maker, content creator, freelancer, indie hacker, influencer, or thought leader, The Creator System will help you stay organised and on track. You no longer need to rely solely on your motivation or inspiration to get things done.
previous.title: The Creator System - Be organised, stay productive and produce outcomes in Notion

localize.description: 无论你是制造者、内容创作者、自由职业者、独立黑客、影响者还是思想领袖，《创客系统》都将帮助你保持组织性和正轨性。你不再需要仅仅依靠你的动机或灵感来完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有条不紊，保持生产力，并在Notion中产生成果。

localize.description: 無論你是製造者、內容創作者、自由職業者、獨立黑客、影響者還是思想領袖，《創客系統》都將幫助你保持組織性和正軌性。你不再需要僅僅依靠你的動機或靈感來完成事情。
localize.tagline: 有條不紊，保持生產力，並在Notion中產生成果。
